messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Digest Number 159
messages.msgSnippet: Theoretically nobody knows exactly the full  two swords technique of Musashi. Though there are a few schools who they intend they teach Musashi s technique. Go
messages.messageBody:
Theoretically nobody knows exactly the full two swords technique of
Musashi.
Though there are a few schools who they intend they teach Musashi's
technique.
Go to Hyoho Niten Ichi Ryu:
http://www.geocities.com/Tokyo/Pagoda/8187/Niten.htm

for more details.

amphipolis
